get.summary: You can call this endpoint to retrieve the details of a legal entity customer by their customer ID.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

parameters.name: X-Request-Time
parameters.description: The current UNIX timestamp in seconds. This value will be rejected if it is more than 60 seconds late.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The customer ID of the legal entity.

get.summary: You can call this endpoint to retrieve details of any related parties to a customer by their customer ID.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

parameters.name: X-Request-Time
parameters.description: The current UNIX timestamp in seconds. This value will be rejected if it is more than 60 seconds late.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The customer ID of the legal entity

post.summary: You can call this endpoint to add a relation between an existing party and a legal entity.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The ID of the customer

requestBody.description: Information required to add related party to customer

post.summary: You can call this endpoint to updates a legal entity's current address. The old address is retained as a previous address.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The customer ID of the legal entity.

requestBody.description: Information required to update the customer's address

delete.summary: You can call this endpoint to removes a related party link between two customers.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

parameters.name: X-Request-Time
parameters.description: The current UNIX timestamp in seconds. This value will be rejected if it is more than 60 seconds late.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The ID of the original customer.

parameters.name: relatedCustomerId
parameters.description: The ID of the related customer to unlink. This is the customer that holds the relation type. For example, 'UBO'.

parameters.name: relatedPartyType
parameters.description: The type of related party. Used to disambiguate where a party is related in more than one way.

put.summary: You can use this endpoint to add or update a legal entity's tax residency entry for the specified country.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The customer ID of this legal entity.

parameters.name: countryOfTaxResidence
parameters.description: Country of tax residence, given as an ISO 3166-1 three letter country-code.

requestBody.description: Tax residency details (TIN or reason for no TIN).

delete.summary: You can use this endpoint to remove a legal entity's tax residency entry for the specified country.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

parameters.name: X-Request-Time
parameters.description: The current UNIX timestamp in seconds. This value will be rejected if it is more than 60 seconds late.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The customer ID of this legal entity.

parameters.name: countryOfTaxResidence
parameters.description: Country of tax residence to remove, given as an ISO 3166-1 three letter country-code.

post.summary: You can call this endpoint to request the creation of a new legal entity customer.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

requestBody.description: Information required to create legal entity

patch.summary: You can call this endpoint to update the details of a legal entity customer. To update a legal entity's current registered or trading address, refer to the dedicated address endpoint.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The customer ID of the legal entity.

requestBody.description: Information required to update a legal entity customer

buildingNameNumber.description: The building name/number at this address.

city.description: The city name at this address.

county.description: The county name at this address.

postalCode.description: The postal code of this address.

validFrom.description: The date from which this address was current, formatted yyyy-MM-dd.

validTo.description: If this address if a previous address, the date at which this address expired. Formatted yyyy-MM-dd.

isCurrentAddress.description: Indicates if this address is the current address.

currentAddresses.description: The legal entity's current trading and registered address.

AddressHistoryMultipleCurrentAddressesGe.description: Addresses associated with the customer with multiple current addresses

AddressType.description: Represents the type of the address.

sicCodes.description: The Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) codes associated with the business.

BusinessClassificationPatchModel.description: Patch model containing SoleTrader business classification fields that were updated.

tradingName.description: The trading name of the business.

registeredName.description: The registered name of the business.

registrationNumber.description: The registration number of the business.

annualRevenue.description: The annual revenue of the business.

email.description: The contact email address of the business.

telephone.description: The contact telephone number of the business.

BusinessDetailsGetResponse.description: Object containing the business details of this legal entity.

BusinessDetailsPatchModel.description: Patch model containing SoleTrader business details that were updated.

CountryCode.description: 3-letter country code, as defined in ISO 3166-1.

sanctions.description: Indicates if the customer is under sanctions.

sicCodes.description: The Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) codes associated with the business.

CreateLegalEntityBusinessClassificationR.description: Request body for legal entity business classification details.

tradingName.description: The trading name of the business.

registeredName.description: The registered name of the business.

registrationNumber.description: The registration number of the business.

annualRevenue.description: The annual revenue of the business.

email.description: The contact email address of the business.

telephone.description: The contact telephone number of the business.

CreateLegalEntityBusinessDetailRequest.description: Request body for business details when creating a legal entity customer.

CreateLegalEntityRequest.description: Request body for creating a legal entity customer.

taxResidencies.description: Gets or sets the collection of tax residencies to be created as part of the request.

vatRegistrationNumber.description: VAT registration number of the business.

nameOfSelfCertificationSignee.description: Name of the individual who signed the self-certification.

positionOfSelfCertificationSignee.description: Position or title of the individual who signed the self-certification.

CreateLegalEntityTaxDetailsRequest.description: Tax details for a legal entity customer.

CreateMultipleAddressHistoryRequest.description: The customer's address history for multiple current addresses

relatedCustomerId.description: The ID of the customer to be linked to the customer in the path as a related party.

ownershipPercentage.description: The ownership percentage of the related party.  Optional: applies only to certain related party types.

CreateRelatedPartyRequest.description: A request to link one customer to another as a related party.

CreateTaxResidencyRequest.description: Request to create a information about a customer's tax residency, including country of tax residence and tax identification details.

customerId.description: Unique identifier for the linked customer

relatedCustomerId.description: Unique identifier for the linked individual

CreatedRelatedPartyResponse.description: Response containing information about the created related party

id.description: The unique ID of the created legal entity.

CreatedResourceResponse.description: Response containing the ID of the created legal entity.

buildingNameNumber.description: The building name or number of this address.

streetName.description: The street name of this address.

city.description: The name of the city at this address.

county.description: The name of the county at this address.

postalCode.description: The post code of this address.

validFrom.description: The date from which this address is valid. Defaults to today's date if unspecified.

CustomerStatus.description: Represents the status of a customer in the system. This will always be 'Active'.

customerId.description: The ID of the customer under which the new address or tax residency entry was created.

CustomerSubresourceCreatedResponse.description: Represents the response returned when a subresource is created for a customer.

sanctions.description: Indicates if the customer is under sanctions.

KycAmlPatchModel.description: Patch model containing KYC/AML fields that were updated. Only properties that changed are present.

LegalEntityBusinessDetailsPatchModel.description: Object containing the legal entity's business details fields that were updated.

sicCodes.description: Updated SIC (Standard Industrial Classification) codes (if changed).

LegalEntityCustomerBusinessClassificatio.description: Patch model containing legal entity business classification fields that were updated.

id.description: The unique identifier of the customer. You should keep note of this, as you'll need it to amend or access the customer later.

institutionId.description: The unique identifier of the institution associated with this customer.

LegalEntityCustomerGetResponse.description: The Legal Entity Customer type response body

customerId.description: The unique identifier of the legal entity customer.

LegalEntityCustomerPatchResponse.description: Summary of the fields that have been updated for legal entity PATCH. Contains only sections and properties that were changed.

nameOfSelfCertificationSignee.description: Updated name of the self-certification signee (if changed).

positionOfSelfCertificationSignee.description: Updated position of the self-certification signee (if changed).

LegalEntityCustomerTaxDetailsPatchModel.description: Patch model containing legal entity tax detail fields that were updated.

PepType.description: Indicates if the customer is a Politically Exposed Person.

buildingNameNumber.description: The building name or number at this address.

streetName.description: The street name at this address.

city.description: The city name at this address.

county.description: The county name at this address.

validFrom.description: Date from which the address is valid.

validTo.description: Date until which the address was valid.

type.description: A URI reference [RFC3986] that identifies the problem type. This specification encourages that, when dereferenced, it provides human-readable documentation for the problem type (e.g., using HTML [W3C.REC-html5-20141028]). When this member is not present, its value is assumed to be "about:blank".

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type. It SHOULD NOT change from occurrence to occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization (e.g., using proactive content negotiation; see[RFC7231], Section 3.4).

status.description: The HTTP status code([RFC7231], Section 6) generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

instance.description: A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem. It may or may not yield further information if dereferenced.

ProblemDetails.description: A machine-readable format for specifying errors in HTTP API responses based on https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7807

RcaType.description: Indicates if the customer is a relative or close associate.

ReasonForNoTaxId.description: Supported reasons for not having a tax ID. Only required if no tax ID number is provided.

ownershipPercentage.description: The copmany ownership percentage this related party has. Only provided for UBOs.

SectorCode.description: The sector code this business operates within.

taxResidencies.description: Collection of tax residencies of the legal entity.

vatRegistrationNumber.description: VAT registration number of the business.

nameOfSelfCertificationSignee.description: Name of the individual who signed the self-certification.

positionOfSelfCertificationSignee.description: Position or title of the individual who signed the self-certification.

TaxDetailsGetResponse.description: The tax details of this legal entity.

taxIdNumber.description: The tax ID number for this tax residency.

USPerson.description: Specifies the classification of a legal entity as a U.S. person for regulatory or reporting purposes.

UpdateBusinessClassificationRequest.description: Business Classification update request. Null values are ignored.

sanctions.description: Indicates if the customer is under sanctions. Null value is ignored.

UpdateKycAmlRequest.description: KYC AML update request. Null values are ignored.

sicCodes.description: The Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) codes associated with the business. Null value is ignored

UpdateLegalEntityBusinessClassificationR.description: Request body specific for Legal Entity business classification details.

tradingName.description: The trading name of the business. Null value is ignored

registeredName.description: The registered name of the business. Null value is ignored

registrationNumber.description: The registration number of the business. Null value is ignored

annualRevenue.description: The annual revenue of the business. Null value is ignored.

email.description: The contact email address of the business. Null value is ignored.

telephone.description: The contact telephone number of the business. Null value is ignored.

UpdateLegalEntityBusinessDetailsRequest.description: Object containing the business details of this legal entity.

UpdateLegalEntityRequest.description: Legal Entity Customer update request. Null values are ignored.

vatRegistrationNumber.description: VAT registration number of the business.

nameOfSelfCertificationSignee.description: Name of the individual who signed the self-certification.

positionOfSelfCertificationSignee.description: Position or title of the individual who signed the self-certification.

UpdateLegalEntityTaxDetailsRequest.description: Tax details for a legal entity customer.

taxIdNumber.description: The updated tax identification number for this tax residency.

UpdateTaxResidencyRequest.description: The customer's tax residency update request.

This specification encourages that, when dereferenced, it provides human-readable documentation for the problem type (e.g., using HTML [W3C.REC-html5-20141028]). When this member is not present, its value is assumed to be "about:blank".

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type. It SHOULD NOT change from occurrence to occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization (e.g., using proactive content negotiation; see[RFC7231], Section 3.4).

status.description: The HTTP status code([RFC7231], Section 6) generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

instance.description: A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem. It may or may not yield further information if dereferenced.
